title: How to Draw a Computer Mouse

steps.title: Draw a big diagonal oval.
steps.content: Draw a big diagonal oval . Make the sides slightly squared.

steps.title: Sketch
steps.content: Sketch a diagonal line 2/3 of the way down the oval.

steps.title: Draw a line separating the bottom 1/3 in half.
steps.content: Draw a line separating the bottom 1/3 in half. Draw a flat hexagon .

steps.title: Add an oval at the middle of the hexagon.
steps.content: Add an oval at the middle of the hexagon. Then draw the wire using 2 curved lines.

steps.title: Ink your drawings.
steps.content: Ink your drawings. Erase the sketch.
